help.user:
📚 **Legal Clinic Bot Usage Guide**

**Main Functions:**

🔸 **Ask a Question**
   • Select the appropriate category for your legal question
   • Describe your situation in detail (minimum 150 characters)
   • Review the text and confirm submission
   • Your question will be reviewed by an administrator

🔸 **FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)**
   • Browse ready answers to popular questions
   • Select a category and find a suitable question
   • Your question might already have a ready answer

🔸 **My Requests**
   • Track the status of your requests
   • View received answers
   • Learn rejection reasons (if applicable)

**📋 Request Statuses:**
• ⏳ Under Review - your request is being checked by administrator
• 👨‍💼 Awaiting Executor - request approved, looking for executor
• 🔄 In Progress - student is working on the answer
• ✅ Answer Under Review - answer ready, being checked by administrator
• ✅ Closed - you received an answer to your question
• ❌ Declined - request not accepted for review

**📝 Question Requirements:**
• Minimum 150 characters in request text
• Clearly formulate your legal situation
• Include all important details and circumstances
• Select the appropriate law category

**⏰ Processing Time:**
• Admin review: usually within 1-2 days
• Student answer preparation: 3-7 days
• Admin answer review: 1-2 days

**❓ If problems arise:**
• Make sure your question contains sufficient details
• Check that the correct category is selected
• When rejected, carefully read the administrator's comment

**⚠️ Important to remember:**
- Consultations are informational in nature
- Do not replace full legal assistance
- For serious legal issues, contact a practicing lawyer
help.admin:
🔧 Administrator Help

Category Management:
/add\_category - Add new category
/edit\_category - Edit existing category
/delete\_category - Delete category
/categories - Show all categories

FAQ Management:
/add\_faq - Add new FAQ question
/edit\_faq - Edit existing FAQ question
/delete\_faq - Delete FAQ question
/faqs - Show all FAQ by categories

Requests and Statistics:
/requests [page] - Show list of all requests (with pagination)
/stats - Show bot statistics

Admin Rights:
/getadmin - Get administrator rights (admin chat only)

Request Processing:
• Incoming user requests appear with "Approve" and "Decline" buttons
• When approved - request is sent to students
• When declined - need to specify rejection reason
• Student answers come with "Confirm" and "Decline" buttons
• When confirmed - answer is sent to user
• When declined - student can fix answer or reject assignment

⚠️ Important Notes:
- Category deletion only possible if not used in requests or FAQ
- All actions are logged in the system
- When declining, always provide clear reason for users/students
help.student:
👨‍🎓 Student Help

How to work with requests:

1️⃣ Getting a request:
   • Administrator-approved requests appear in this chat
   • Click "🔄 Take to work" to accept the request
   • ⚠️ Only one request can be processed simultaneously

2️⃣ Working on request:
   • After accepting, request details will come to your private messages
   • Write your answer to the bot in private chat
   • Review your answer and click "Confirm Answer Submission"

3️⃣ Request actions:
   • Confirm Answer Submission - send answer for administrator review
   • Edit Answer - modify your answer
   • Reject Assignment - return request to general queue

4️⃣ After submitting answer:
   • Administrator will review your answer
   • If approved - answer goes to user, you're free for new request
   • If declined - you'll get comment and can fix the answer

📋 Request Statuses:
• ⏳ Under Review - waiting for admin decision
• 👨‍💼 Awaiting Executor - can be taken to work
• 🔄 In Progress - being processed by student
• ✅ Under Review - answer sent to admin
• ✅ Closed - request completed
• ❌ Declined - declined by admin

⚠️ Important Rules:
- Provide quality and detailed answers to legal questions
- If unsure about answer - better reject the assignment
- Follow professional ethics
- One student = one active assignment
